mapper.insert: insert into company(cSerial, cCeo, cName, cPeople, cCreated, cSize, cTel, cProfit, cIntro, mId, subCode) values(#{cSerial}, #{cCeo}, #{cName}, #{cPeople}, #{cCreated}, #{cSize}, #{cTel}, #{cProfit}, #{cIntro}, #{mId}, #{subCode})
insert into com_image(ciNum, cSaveFilename, cOriginalFilename, cSerial) values(com_image_seq.nextval, #{cSaveFilename}, #{cOriginalFilename}, #{cSerial})
